note.p: Memberships: Extra-licentiate of the College of Physicians (1692)

Notes: Proposed by James Hodgson. Death date based on the fact that administration of his estate was granted to his widow on 14 Dec 1715 (PRO Prob 6.91 fo 116). He last appears on PL dated 1714 and was probably left off because of arrears - see CM 22 Jul 1714.
